alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 8:45PM CDT until August 11 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... South central Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 845 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Altus Air Force Base, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Snyder, Mountain Park, Headrick, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Humphreys, and Tom Steed Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
